item.title: New Hope Club,P1Harmony - Super Chic
item.description:
Long hair feet below
the knees she a
Super
super super chic
Her face could sell
a magazine she a
Super
super super chic

up her tree she a
Super
super super chic

won’t believe she a

sweetener

of the tongue teaser

off my brain freeze

like a coffee

ugh divine
